column4: food available at other times of day would be nice

column3: Few minutes walking from all places to visit on Bruges.
column4:
Staff didn't answer my message sent via Booking. 
Minor There isn't a shower

column3: The view of the canal.. amazing!
column4: Interior room furnishing could use a bit of a refresh.. but it was fine.

column3: The hotel's location is perfect and everything is both modern and classical at the same time. This provides a comfortable and enjoyable stay.
column4: The airconditioning was sometimes a little bit loud. The beds were technically not one large queen-sized bed, but two separate beds put together and layered with a top mattrass. Nonetheless, we didn't quite experience this as less comfortable, but still

column3: The location was amazing. Such a beautiful hotel that had everything we needed inside and right outside too.
Easy access to central Bruges. Clean and modern rooms with a fantastic view of the canals from the breakfast room.
column4: Traffic noise in bedrooms adjacent to the road. Staff were more than willing moved us to a side room which solved the issue.
